body.p:
To His Excellency Beriah Mcgoffin
Governor of Kentucky.

The undersigned states that at the August Term of the Waren Equity & Criminal, he was fined by a Jury $200 on a charge of permitting unlawful gaming in a House. That he prayed an appeal to the court of Appeals -- but for failure to file a copy of the record in sixty days -- The appeal was dismissed -- He files a copy of the opinion together with a copy of the evidence with this petition. He is persuaded injustice has been don him and respectfully asks yr Excellency to inter pose in his behalf & remit the fine --

Warren E & C. Ct
$200 } Gaming
S. W. Young
Respited 12 mos
Issd Mar. 8. 1860
IssRemission Issd
Apr. 9. 1861.
